sentences.sContent: An amine or amino resin is the alkylated reaction product of urea or melamine and formaldehyde.
sentences.sContent_eng: An amine or amino resin is the alkylated reaction product of urea or melamine and formaldehyde.
sentences.sCn: 含胺基或氨基树脂是尿素或三聚氰胺和甲醛烷基化反应产品。

sentences.sContent: Sugar and acid had no effect on the content of amino azotes of passionflower juice, which only relate to the content of fumet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sugar and acid had no effect on the content of amino azotes of passionflower juice, which only relate to the content of fumet.
sentences.sCn: 利用氨基氮的含量检测西番莲果汁含量。西番莲果汁中氨基氮的含量不受酸、糖的影响，只与原果汁的含量有关系。

phrases.pCn: 氨基酸序列；氨基酸顺序
氨基酸分析仪；氨基酸组成分析仪
